data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Basilan that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Basilan, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Basilan a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Basilan unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 112,395 people in the state of Basilan who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Iranun people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Basilan, Philippines not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: There are 145,900 people living in the state of Basilan. Only about 20,324 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the state of Basilan, Philippines has a population of 145,900.

We estimate Basilan has 20,324 people who might know Jesus, 112,395 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 13,182 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Basilan.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
